text: Samuel ga dahi mai dana lolo olib ga hagatulu adu di libogo o Saul mo di hongi adu a mee ga helekai, “Ma go Dimaadua dela gu hagatulu goe belee hai di king o digau Israel. Goe gaa dagi digau Israel, gaa daa digaula gi daha mo nadau hagadaumee huogodoo. Gei aanei laa nia haga modongoohia o do hilihili aga go God bolo goe dela gaa dagi digau Israel:
